channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:39 Alarm response in Khmelnytskyi region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 06:39 Alarm response in Khmelnytskyi region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Хмельницкая_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 06:34 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 🟢 06:34 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements. item.description: 🟡 05:04 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk oblast.
